Melsa still isn't too happy about my doing this Bamarama business—but she can't deny that it was profitable last year!

Never mind me. Come on in, and take a look around! You can watch thrilling matches between 5 and 10 p.m. Pacific nightly, so be on time! We'll have gold ticket matches every ten minutes, and one diamond ticket match every hour, at ten 'til!

The bookies will be taking bets right before each match begins—and taking breaks between matches.
